China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 3 月 16 日星期六 03:22:25 GMT 120
Australia PM to talk wine tariffs with China Foreign Minister in CanberraAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Saturday the removal of Chinese tariffs on Australian wine would be on the agenda when he meets China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi next week in Canberra. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 00:51:58 GMT OCTCKJ3LYRMN3BMBEPSGRK2P6I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-talk-wine-tariffs-with-china-foreign-minister-canberra-2024-03-16/Reuters世界亚太地区
TikTok urges US users to call senators to vote no on TikTok banTikTok displayed a notification to some U.S. users on Friday, urging them to call their senators and ask them to vote no to a bill that would ban the popular short-form video app if it is not divested from Chinese tech company ByteDance. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 18:39:57 GMT F52TATRICRNWLCCL45UC6Q3H5A https://www.reuters.com/technology/tiktok-urged-us-users-call-senators-vote-no-tiktok-ban-2024-03-15/Sheila Dang, Nazli Togrul技术
China's JD.com walks away from offer for Britain's CurrysChina-based online retailer JD.com said on Friday it would not make an offer for British electricals group Currys , days after U.S. investor Elliott Advisors walked away. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 14:11:32 GMT MT7YTBILMBPKZBVAEH6TEOFALE https://www.reuters.com/markets/deals/china-jdcom-walks-away-bidding-curries-2024-03-15/Reuters市场交易
BMW apologizes after criticism from annual Chinese consumer showGerman carmaker BMW apologized to Chinese drivers on Friday after its BMW 530Li model's transmission shaft was singled out on the country's annual consumer day gala television show for producing "disturbing" noises. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 13:56:22 GMT NUHP76WTEFNXVE77FMS4ZQ64VM https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/bmw-spotlight-chinas-annual-consumer-rights-day-2024-03-15/Sophie Yu, Casey Hall商业汽车与交通
China's CATL posts first quarterly profit fall since 2022, regains market shareChinese electric vehicle battery maker CATL posted its first drop in quarterly net profit since the second quarter of 2022 on Friday as it wrestled with smaller competitors amid slowing demand in the world's largest auto market. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:40:37 GMT YXTHXKYX4FKV3HCEFZ3D36BQZU https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/chinas-catl-posts-first-profit-fall-since-q2-2022-2024-03-15/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Apple reaches $490 million settlement over CEO Cook's China sales commentsApple agreed to pay $490 million to settle a class-action lawsuit that alleged Chief Executive Tim Cook defrauded shareholders by concealing falling demand for iPhones in China. Fri, 15 Mar 2024 12:27:12 GMT 6AW33JRTSFM6FJKJOVKTPAM https://www.reuters.com/legal/apple-reaches-490-million-settlement-with-shareholders-over-china-sales-comments-2024-03-15/Jonathan Stempel可持续发展董事会、政策和法规
